quotes.quote: A prepared person will always have his opportunity.
We must be prepared to face our responsibilities and be willing to use force if necessary.
Because if you're prepared and you know what it takes, it's not a risk. You just have to figure out how to get there. There is always a way to get there.
Make preparations in advance ... you never have trouble if you are prepared for it.
If you are prepared, you will be confident, and will do the job.
To be prepared is half the victory.
Be Prepared... the meaning of the motto is that a scout must prepare himself by previous thinking out and practicing how to act on any accident or emergency so that he is never taken by surprise.
Prior preparation is Success divided by half. Once you have fully prepared, every hand glove that obstacles wear to pull you away from reaching your destination will become slippery!
We must prepare all learners for their future, not our past.
Only by being prepared for your death can you ever truly live.
If somebody's not prepared to answer the question, you can keep asking.
Some things are so unexpected that no one is prepared for them.
Be prepared and be honest.
A message prepared in the mind reaches a mind; a message prepared in a life reaches a life.
Where observation is concerned, chance favors only the prepared mind.
If you are prepared, then you are able to feel confident.
The better you're prepared, the better chance you'll have at staying on top of everything that is coming your way.
There is always a prepared place for a prepared person.
Only someone who is well prepared has the opportunity to improvise.
You are always being prepared for something better or protected from something worse.

You must prepare for success even if there is no indication of it. You must prepare for success even if you have become accustomed to failure. You must prepare for success even if nobody in your life ever achieved anything. Take time to prepare hard.
Confidence comes from being prepared.
If you fail to prepare, you're prepared to fail.
Be prepared for trouble. Don't fall apart when trouble strikes.
You always gotta be on time, an hour ahead of everything. You always gotta be prepared.
Be prepared to scramble right from the start.
We are prepared for some things, and we receive just as fast as we prepare ourselves.
Being prepared to die is one of the great secrets of living
Being prepared for loss is never the same as being ready for it.
Prepare while others are daydreaming.
